reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of BIOL 230, GEOB 207 and one of GEOB 200, GEOB 204.
Co-reqs: One of GEOB 206, EOSC 330.
Field sampling, instrumentation, surveying, mapping techniques, and data analysis; mandatory multi-day field camp during the second week of May at the Cheakamus Centre (near Squamish). Special fees and liability insurance are required.
Note: This is a wait list for GEOB 309, section 201, Term 2. You will be moved into active registration if space becomes available. Wait list does not guarantee placement in this course.
description: Field sampling, instrumentation, surveying, mapping techniques, and data analysis; mandatory multi-day field camp in April or May. Special fees and liability insurance are required.
